\n

Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.
